original_text: He said to David, “You are more righteous than I, for you have repaid me good, whereas I have repaid you evil.
korean_text: 다윗에게 이르되 나는 너를 학대하되 너는 나를 선대하니 너는 나보다 의롭도다

sentences.original_text: You are more righteous than I,
for you have repaid me good,
whereas I have repaid you evil.
